comment: This class is a waste of time. attendance is mandatory, but there were a couple times where she wouldn't bother showing up and had her assistant show videos instead. Uses power points for the class, but will only put random pages up on Georgia view.She does post a study guide for the test, if you use that you can walk out of there with a "B" with l

She was a great teacher. She is very knowledgeable on the subject and definitely cares for the class to pass. She offers amazing extra credit-40 points, which brought my grade up so much. She lets you exempt the final if you have an A by the end of November which is great. She gets very mad if you leave class in the middle, but coming to her class

Good professor, especially for her first semester. Gave extra credit just for showing up on random days, up to 40 points, which immensely helped. She's pretty quick to answer email questions and pretty much knows what she's talking about. Didn't even buy the book and got a B, would have made an A if I'd studied. Recommended if you have to take it.

She's a pretty cool professor. 40 points of extra credit-offered online or in class (which is the easiest way to get it). First quiz is the most tricky. I would have had a 91% in the class if she dropped the lowest quiz. Study hard for the tests, they are not tricky if you take your time. Final was trickiest exam. Take her if you can't get Simpson!

this class was extreme you have to work for your grade. You have three test and extra credit is worth 40 points. The test r very hard n tricky. final is cumulative u might want to rethink taking this professor.All test r close book n definition based using examples.go to class u never know when she will give extra credit!
If you attend class and take advantage of extra credit, you will do well. She's super helpful and very fair to students.  She makes the material very relevant and interesting.
She is young and hot. This is her first year as instructor in college. So there is no lecture you must attend. you only need to study power point for this course. and extra nice curving for exam.

I was very nervous about taking 1101. She is a new professor but very laid back.She gives different opportunties for extra credit. To do well in her class study the power points and read. The material may be boring but you learn a lot. I'm going green as a result
New teacher but willing to help her students with anything.  Opportunity for extra credit and as long as you show up for class you should do well.  Give her a chance.

This is ridiculous; it's her first semester ever teaching and she thinks that she is teaching PhD Students. Her lectures are boring, she only reads from a powerpoint(doesn't teach at all!) and then her quizzes and tests are ridiculously tricky. She even said "There are multiple right answers, I just want you to pick the best one" on her tests. BEWA

Professor is very nice and helpful,answers e-mail quickly and states her expectations for the class with no confusion. Typically just reads from power points and does not go in depth with information.  Exams can be tricky because of wording of answers to questions with several possibilities of a correct answer.  This is her first semester teaching.
